name: Avoid programs with low comment / code ratio  (Shell)
description: This rule searches all the programs having a low comment/code ratio.
output:
The report lists all the  unreferenced Shell Programs
It provides following information: 
- Program full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the program.
remediation: Try to increase the comment/code ratio for programs.
